bill_title: Honoring Pete Roberts for being named Noel Olson Volunteer of the Year.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring Pete Roberts for being named Noel Olson Volunteer of the Year. WHEREAS, Tea's Pete Roberts of Augustana University was named the Noel Olson Volunteer of the Year; and WHEREAS, the Noel Olson Volunteer of the Year Award recognizes the singular commitment of former NSIC coach and Athletic Administrator Noel Olson and his advancement of NSIC visibility, credibility, and excellence throughout the nation during his tenure in the league; and WHEREAS, on a volunteer basis, Roberts created NSICScores.com, running multiple servers out of his own basement using his personal Midco connection. The website allows individuals to see live scores and statistics of NSIC events. Roberts has also created countless statistics documents to help teach communication staff and has built his own YouTube channel to teach other schools about stats: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature shows its congratulations and gratitude toward Pete Roberts for his countless hours spent trying to improve the experience of NSIC fans. He has always put others before himself and will continue to display this level of excellence in volunteering.
